fields.name: Get Drunk In Your Kiddie Pool:
fields.value: Get drunk in your kiddie pool, repulsing anyone who visits you.

fields.name: Shitter's Full:
fields.value: Empty your RV's portable toilet, repulsing anyone who visits you.

fields.name: Marjorie Why Won't You Take Me Back?:
fields.value: Call your ex-wife, sobbing, and tell her you're a changed man. this action will repulse anyone who visits you.

fields.name: Went to Get Milk (x1):
fields.value: Go out to get milk. You're not included in day chat for the next phase.

fields.name: Chug A Bottle Of Vodka (1x):
fields.value: Chug your last bottle of vodka. Fall asleep in your lazy boy. Gain (1x) Broken Bottle.

fields.name: Cmon Man You Gotta Redeem This Bottle:
fields.value: Attempt to redeem your Broken Bottle at another player's house, repulsing anyone who also visited them.
